sentence.Network_en: We spend the afternoon traipse from one shop to another.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们用了一下午的时间逛商店,疲惫不堪地逛了一家又一家.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 游记作家的苦与乐_文化生活_快乐英语网 ... 11. intoxication 陶醉 12. traipse 漫步,拖曳 13. inadvertently 不注意地.

list.abs: After work I traipsed round the shops buying - food for the family ., 下班后 , 我疲乏地走到商店购买家庭用食物.
He traipsed round southern England for 18 months ., 他在英格兰南部游荡 18 个周.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (as a verb): of unknown origin. The noun is first recorded in sense 2 in the late 17th cent

entry.tran: (常因疲惫或不愉快)不情愿地走
entry.def: If you traipse somewhere, you go there unwillingly, often because you are tired or unhappy.

example.ex: If traipsing around shops does not appeal to you, perhaps using a catalogue will...
example.tran: 如果不愿逛商店逛得腰酸腿疼，也许您会愿意使用商品目录。

example.ex: Joyce traipsed from one doctor to another, praying that someone would listen.
example.tran: 乔伊丝从一位大夫奔波到另一位那里，期盼着有人会认真听她的话。

entry.tran: 令人不快地走(或转悠);碍事地走(或转悠)
entry.def: If you talk about people traipsing somewhere, you mean that they are going there or moving about there in a way that annoys someone or gets in their way.

example.ex: You will have to get used to a lot of people traipsing in and out of your home...
example.tran: 你将不得不习惯许多人在你家进进出出。

example.ex: She doesn't want security men traipsing round with her every minute of the day.
example.tran: 她不希望保安人员每时每刻都在她身边转来转去。

auth_sentence.content: It means a traipse upstairs to the members' bar.
auth_sentence.res_content: It means a traipse upstairs to the members' bar.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It means a traipse upstairs to the members' bar.

auth_sentence.content: That means coach passengers will no longer traipse through first class on its transcontinental flights.
auth_sentence.res_content: That means coach passengers will no longer traipse through first class on its transcontinental flights.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That means coach passengers will no longer traipse through first class on its transcontinental flights.

auth_sentence.content: Instead, we bought a deep acrylic tub for one of the kids' bathrooms so I can always traipse down there for a true soak.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead, we bought a deep acrylic tub for one of the kids' bathrooms so I can always traipse down there for a true soak.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead, we bought a deep acrylic tub for one of the kids' bathrooms so I can always traipse down there for a true soak.
